name: Roboflow
headline: ð¼ï¸ Give your software the sense of sight.
description:
Roboflow enables developers to make the world programmable.

Use our tools to build better datasets (collect image, video / annotate), models (foundation and fine tuned small models), and deployments (self hosted, edge, APIs, SDKs) for computer vision. Over 250k developers, including those from over half the Fortune 100, build with our open source and hosted tools.

Build with us: https://app.roboflow.com
Hack with us: https://roboflow.slab.com/public/posts/roboflow-hackathons-external-u478m1iz
Work with us: roboflow.com/careers
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:machine-learning; industry:computer-vision; industry:api; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Joseph Nelson, Founder
founders.description:
Cofounder of Roboflow, enabling developers to make the world programmable with open source and hosted computer vision tools for dataset, models, and deployments.

Previously, cofounded/sold Represently ("Zendesk for Congress"), taught at General Assembly, and worked at Facebook.

founders.name: Brad Dwyer, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of Roboflow; putting computer vision into the toolbelt of every developer.

Previously founded and bootstrapped Hatchlings, a social gaming company, to 10 million+ users and 7 figures in revenue.

I love building things. I've been putting stuff online for basically as long as I can remember. In high school ran a web development company that did work for companies including Charles Schwab, Sony BMG, and PAX TV (on the Internet, no one knows you're still in high school).

## Over 16,000 organizations build with Roboflow.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/663d3f8b423f6c45517e30ed_logo-rivian-coolgray-300.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/663e96f164cac1d35798b654_logo-usg-coolgray-400.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e2060d4ade9be9f3ab8667_aw-gray.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e20676737d7494d4e7ca76_jd-gray.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/673f5b6df758da4de2d771cd_logo-pella-coolgray-400.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/673f5b6e48af490ff907d510_logo-bnsf-coolgray-400.png)
Build Your Pipeline
Curate + Understand
Label Collaboratively
Train + Evaluate
Cloud + Edge Deploy
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0a3110fe5bde389d8650f_cogs-home.svg)
Our integrated workflow builder and deployment infrastructure ensures what is configured can be deployed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0a31110ad9c387f03946b_camera-home.svg)
Deploy with a hosted API or to the edge with video streams or image data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0a3119f3f67537e9e6a48_cubes-home.svg)
Combine custom models, open source models, LLM APIs, pre-built logic, and external applications.
[Explore Workflows](https://roboflow.com/</workflows/build>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e09e5a023abfe451910e78_home-search.svg)
Explore, visualize, filter, curate, and organize data to create the best dataset for your next training run.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e09e5aef86e3e8e59b2838_home-chart-area.svg)
Find insights in your data with built in analytics to understand where and how to improve your dataset.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e09e5a02e476c2420159c2_layers-home.svg)
Generate up to 50 augmented versions of each image in your dataset to improve model generalization.
[Explore Annotate](https://roboflow.com/</annotate>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0a7db1c5b6051b5a2e57c_images-home.svg)
Manage your pipeline of uploading, assigning, reviewing, and approving annotations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0a7a7f9818ea103e3b950_bubbles-home.svg)
Quickly communicate feedback, share instructions, and reach consensus for labeling decisions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0a7a78d65126f8c69312c_network-home.svg)
Label data quickly with a suite of AI-assisted annotation tools. Augment human labeling or fully automate labeling.
[Explore Annotate](https://roboflow.com/</annotate>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0aefebc5420dced0345fd_server-home.svg)
Optimized infrastructure with our hosted state of the art train, including a hosted API endpoint for models.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0aefca493c79cfafba0fc_sizes-home.svg)
Choose from five model sizes to optimize for fast iteration and low compute deployment or for the highest accuracy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0aefc9b906ac3f54cef97_scatter-home.svg)
Evaluate your model performance and identify where it under performs and what data to gather.
[Explore Train](https://roboflow.com/</train>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0b4a051b38a951f1a1c80_terminal-home.svg)
Run models directly on Roboflow’s infrastructure through an infinitely-scalable API.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0b4a0a198d841cf4c7b09_vial-home.svg)
Use our exclusively provisioned server running Roboflow Inference out of the box to build and test your application logic.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6bc60e665f54545a1e52a5/66e0b4a00b08454f979b08c4_pie-home.svg)
View metrics like inference volume, confidence, inference time, and individual prediction results for deployed models.
[Explore Deploy](https://roboflow.com/</deploy>)

generated_description:
### Summary of Roboflow

**Company Name:** Roboflow  
**Founded:** 2019  
**Location:** San Francisco, California  
**Team Size:** ~50 employees  
**Funding:** Recently completed a $40M Series B funding round.  

---

**Mission Statement:** Roboflow aims to give software “the sense of sight.” Essentially, they're in the business of making computer vision accessible and effective for developers, enabling them to build intelligent applications that can interpret visual data.

#### Core Offerings
Roboflow offers a comprehensive suite of tools that assist developers in the following:
- **Building Datasets:** Collecting and annotating images and videos efficiently.
- **Training Models:** Providing access to foundational and fine-tuned models for various applications.
- **Deployments:** Offering diverse deployment options including self-hosting, edge computing, APIs, and SDKs.  

Over 250,000 developers (including teams from over half of Fortune 100 companies) utilize Roboflow’s open-source and hosted tools.

**Platforms and Solutions:**
1. **Universe** - A repository for open-source computer vision datasets and pre-trained models.
2. **Annotate** - AI-assisted data annotation tools for labeling images quickly.
3. **Train** - Model training infrastructure with GPU support.
4. **Workflows** - A low-code interface for building pipelines and applications.
5. **Deploy** - Infrastructure to run models on various platforms - be it on-device, at the edge, or through APIs.

#### Industry Applications
Roboflow caters to diverse industries, including:
- **Aerospace & Defense**
- **Automotive**
- **Agriculture**
- **Banking & Finance**
- **Healthcare**
- **Telecommunications**
- **Retail & E-commerce**
- **Manufacturing**
- **Logistics**

Their technology is transformative, proving beneficial by improving efficiency, reducing costs, and enhancing the quality of products across these sectors.

#### Developer Focus
Roboflow is all about enabling developers. They provide comprehensive documentation, user forums, and even hold hackathons to engage the community. Their platform supports a variety of integrations with popular tools and cloud services (like AWS, Google Cloud, Azure), making it straightforward for developers to adopt.

#### Reliability and Compliance
Security is a priority for Roboflow. They comply with SOC2 Type 2 and HIPAA regulations, ensuring data is handled securely. Their enterprise-grade infrastructure appeals to businesses looking for trusted solutions in machine learning and AI.

---

Roboflow isn’t just about tools; it’s about creating an ecosystem where developers can leverage computer vision to build smarter applications. Whether you're just starting or looking to scale your vision technology, Roboflow makes it not just possible but efficient and effective.

**Want to dive in?** Check them out at [Roboflow.com](https://roboflow.com). Happy building!
